Complete the following Lean 4 code:
```lean4
import Mathlib

open Set Function Metric
open scoped InnerProductSpace

/--
Let $A, B, C$ denote distinct points with integer coordinates in $\mathbb R^2$. Prove that if
\[(|AB|+|BC|)^2<8\cdot [ABC]+1\]
then $A, B, C$ are three vertices of a square. Here $|XY|$ is the length of segment $XY$ and $[ABC]$ is the area of triangle $ABC$.
-/
theorem putnam_1998_a6
(A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
(hint : ∀ i : Fin 2, ∃ a b c : ℤ, A i = a ∧ B i = b ∧ C i = c)
(htriangle : A ≠ B ∧ A ≠ C ∧ B ≠ C)
(harea : (dist A B + dist B C) ^ 2 < 8 * (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C})).toReal + 1)
(threesquare : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
(threesquare_def : threesquare = fun P Q R ↦ dist Q P = dist Q R ∧ ⟪P - Q, R - Q⟫_ℝ = 0)
: (threesquare A B C ∨ threesquare B C A ∨ threesquare C A B) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1998_a6
(A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
(hint : ∀ i : Fin 2, ∃ a b c : ℤ, A i = a ∧ B i = b ∧ C i = c)
(htriangle : A ≠ B ∧ A ≠ C ∧ B ≠ C)
(harea : (dist A B + dist B C) ^ 2 < 8 * (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C})).toReal + 1)
(threesquare : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
(threesquare_def : threesquare = fun P Q R ↦ dist Q P = dist Q R ∧ ⟪P - Q, R - Q⟫_ℝ = 0)
: (threesquare A B C ∨ threesquare B C A ∨ threesquare C A B) := by
  have h1 : threesquare A B C ∨ threesquare B C A ∨ threesquare C A B := by
    simp only [threesquare_def] at *
    have h2 := hint 0
    have h3 := hint 1
    cases' h2 with a h2
    cases' h3 with b h3
    cases' h2 with a' h2
    cases' h3 with b' h3
    cases' h2 with a'' h2
    cases' h3 with b'' h3
    simp_all [Fin.val_zero, Fin.val_one]
    <;> norm_num
    <;>
    (try
      {
        have h4 : a' = a := by
          nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a' - a), sq_nonneg (b' - b), sq_nonneg (a'' - a), sq_nonneg (b'' - b)]
        have h5 : b' = b := by
          nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a' - a), sq_nonneg (b' - b), sq_nonneg (a'' - a), sq_nonneg (b'' - b)]
        simp_all [h4, h5]
        <;>
        (try
          {
            exact Or.inl ⟨by nlinarith, by nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a'' - a), sq_nonneg (b'' - b)]⟩
          })
        <;>
        (try
          {
            exact Or.inr (Or.inl ⟨by nlinarith, by nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a'' - a), sq_nonneg (b'' - b)]⟩)
          })
        <;>
        (try
          {
            exact Or.inr (Or.inr ⟨by nlinarith, by nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a'' - a), sq_nonneg (b'' - b)]⟩)
          })
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        exact Or.inl ⟨by nlinarith, by nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a' - a), sq_nonneg (b' - b)]⟩
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        exact Or.inr (Or.inl ⟨by nlinarith, by nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a' - a), sq_nonneg (b' - b)]⟩)
      })
    <;>
    (try
      {
        exact Or.inr (Or.inr ⟨by nlinarith, by nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a' - a), sq_nonneg (b' - b)]⟩)
      })
  
  exact h1
```

theorem putnam_1998_a6
(A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
(hint : ∀ i : Fin 2, ∃ a b c : ℤ, A i = a ∧ B i = b ∧ C i = c)
(htriangle : A ≠ B ∧ A ≠ C ∧ B ≠ C)
(harea : (dist A B + dist B C) ^ 2 < 8 * (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C})).toReal + 1)
(threesquare : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
(threesquare_def : threesquare = fun P Q R ↦ dist Q P = dist Q R ∧ ⟪P - Q, R - Q⟫_ℝ = 0)
: (threesquare A B C ∨ threesquare B C A ∨ threesquare C A B) := by
  simp only [threesquare_def] at *
  have h1 := hint 0
  have h2 := hint 1
  cases' h1 with a h1
  cases' h2 with b h2
  cases' h1 with a' h1
  cases' h2 with b' h2
  cases' h1 with a'' h1
  cases' h2 with b'' h2
  simp_all [Fin.val_zero, Fin.val_one, EuclideanSpace.dist_eq, Real.dist_eq, Prod.ext_iff]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at *

    {

      have h4 : b'' = b' := by linarith
      simp_all [h3, h4]
      <;>

          exact Or.inl ⟨by linarith, by linarith⟩
        }) <;>

          exact Or.inr (Or.inl ⟨by linarith, by linarith⟩)
        }) <;>
      (try

        })
    }) <;>

    {
      exact Or.inl ⟨by linarith, by linarith⟩
    }) <;>

```lean4
theorem putnam_1998_a6
(A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
(hint : ∀ i : Fin 2, ∃ a b c : ℤ, A i = a ∧ B i = b ∧ C i = c)
(htriangle : A ≠ B ∧ A ≠ C ∧ B ≠ C)
(harea : (dist A B + dist B C) ^ 2 < 8 * (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C})).toReal + 1)
(threesquare : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
(threesquare_def : threesquare = fun P Q R ↦ dist Q P = dist Q R ∧ ⟪P - Q, R - Q⟫_ℝ = 0)
: (threesquare A B C ∨ threesquare B C A ∨ threesquare C A B) := by
  have h1 := hint 0
  have h2 := hint 1
  rcases h1 with ⟨a1, b1, c1, ha1, hb1, hc1⟩
  rcases h2 with ⟨a2, b2, c2, ha2, hb2, hc2⟩
  simp_all [threesquare_def, EuclideanSpace.dist_eq, Real.dist_eq, Prod.ext_iff]
  -- Normalize the expressions to simplify the inequalities and equalities.
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at harea ⊢
  <;> field_simp [htriangle] at harea ⊢
  <;> norm_cast at harea ⊢
  <;> simp_all [threesquare_def, EuclideanSpace.dist_eq, Real.dist_eq, Prod.ext_iff]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at harea ⊢
  <;> field_simp [htriangle] at harea ⊢
  <;> norm_cast at harea ⊢
  <;> simp_all [threesquare_def, EuclideanSpace.dist_eq, Real.dist_eq, Prod.ext_iff]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at harea ⊢
  <;> field_simp [htriangle] at harea ⊢
  <;> norm_cast at harea ⊢
  <;> simp_all [threesquare_def, EuclideanSpace.dist_eq, Real.dist_eq, Prod.ext_iff]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at harea ⊢
  <;> field_simp [htriangle] at harea ⊢
  <;> norm_cast at harea ⊢
  <;> simp_all [threesquare_def, EuclideanSpace.dist_eq, Real.dist_eq, Prod.ext_iff]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> linarith
```

(A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
(hint : ∀ i : Fin 2, ∃ a b c : ℤ, A i = a ∧ B i = b ∧ C i = c)
(htriangle : A ≠ B ∧ A ≠ C ∧ B ≠ C)

theorem putnam_1998_a6
(A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
(hint : ∀ i : Fin 2, ∃ a b c : ℤ, A i = a ∧ B i = b ∧ C i = c)
(htriangle : A ≠ B ∧ A ≠ C ∧ B ≠ C)
(harea : (dist A B + dist B C) ^ 2 < 8 * (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C})).toReal + 1)
(threesquare : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
(threesquare_def : threesquare = fun P Q R ↦ dist Q P = dist Q R ∧ ⟪P - Q, R - Q⟫_ℝ = 0)
: (threesquare A B C ∨ threesquare B C A ∨ threesquare C A B) := by
  have h1 : threesquare A B C ∨ threesquare B C A ∨ threesquare C A B := by
    simp only [threesquare_def] at *
    have h2 := hint 0
    have h3 := hint 1
    have h4 := htriangle.1
    have h5 := htriangle.2.1
    have h6 := htriangle.2.2
    -- Use the given conditions and properties of the points to derive the necessary conditions for the three squares
    norm_num [Fin.sum_univ_succ, EuclideanSpace.dist_eq, Real.dist_eq, Prod.ext_iff] at *

```lean4
theorem putnam_1998_a6
(A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
(hint : ∀ i : Fin 2, ∃ a b c : ℤ, A i = a ∧ B i = b ∧ C i = c)
(htriangle : A ≠ B ∧ A ≠ C ∧ B ≠ C)
(harea : (dist A B + dist B C) ^ 2 < 8 * (MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, B, C})).toReal + 1)
(threesquare : (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) → Prop)
(threesquare_def : threesquare = fun P Q R ↦ dist Q P = dist Q R ∧ ⟪P - Q, R - Q⟫_ℝ = 0)
: (threesquare A B C ∨ threesquare B C A ∨ threesquare C A B) := by
  have h1 := hint 0
  have h2 := hint 1
  have h3 := hint 0
  have h4 := hint 1
  have h5 := hint 0
  have h6 := hint 1
  rcases h1 with ⟨a, b, c, ha, hb, hc⟩
  rcases h2 with ⟨d, e, f, hd, he, hf⟩
  rcases h3 with ⟨g, h, i, hg, hh, hi⟩
  rcases h4 with ⟨k, l, m, hk, hl, hm⟩
  rcases h5 with ⟨n, o, p, hn, ho, hp⟩
  rcases h6 with ⟨q, r, s, hq, hr, hs⟩
  simp_all [threesquare_def, EuclideanSpace.dist_eq, Real.dist_eq, Prod.smul_def, Prod.ext_iff]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf at harea ⊢
  <;> field_simp [htriangle] at harea ⊢
  <;> norm_cast at harea ⊢
  <;> simp_all [threesquare_def]
  <;> nlinarith
```

(A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
